name: fix-implicitlycopyable-removal
description: Systematic approach to removing ImplicitlyCopyable trait from Mojo structs and fixing resulting compilation errors
author: ProjectOdyssey Team
use_cases: Removing ImplicitlyCopyable trait from Mojo structs
Fixing compilation errors after trait removal
key_patterns: Use transfer operator (^) for non-copyable types
Add __copyinit__ for types that need copying
Use borrowed self for read-only methods
Leverage Mojo's ownership system for memory safety
anti_patterns: Adding ImplicitlyCopyable to avoid fixing ownership issues
Using unnecessary copies instead of borrows
Ignoring compilation errors and adding workarounds
Not understanding when ownership transfer is needed
